actions.committee: Committee on Labor and Human Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Labor and Human Resources.

official_title: A bill to provide for studies and projects relating to health care consumer information.

summary.text: Health Care Consumer Information Act - Directs the Secretary of Health and Human Services to: (1) conduct a study of the effects of efforts to provide hospital price data to third party payors and consumers of health care services; (2) develop methodologies to provide such parties with ambulatory care price data and information about the quality of health care services. Requires a report to Congress within one year.

titles.title: A bill to provide for studies and projects relating to health care consumer information.
